title: Dear Mom
lyrics: o neureun waenji himdeulgo ji cheo begae reul kkeureoa neun chae honja bang ane na ma jeonh wagil manji jakkeorineun naye maeu mi waenji oneulttara wero un geo jo gap jagi ullin jeonhwaye nol la bap meo geonneunji geok jeonghaneun eom ma moksori ga gwi chanke deullyeot teon geu mari oneureun da reungeol itgo isseotteon yaksokdeu ri tteoollayo maeu mi yeppeun sarami dwelkke yo nameul meonjeo saengga kaneun saram dwelkke yo eomma ye sarange baraemdeureul jikyeo galkke yo nawa kkumeul hamkke nanudeon nae meo ril bitgyeo judeon eom maga saeng gangna
